**Tender Announcement**

# Optometrist Services for Warkworth Institution

**RFI Reference:** (No. 9401-A)

**Contracting Entity:** Correctional Service Canada

**Notice Date:** September 22, 2023 (Publication date: September 29, 2023)

## Tender Overview
The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to provide optometrist services to offenders at Warkworth Institution. The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering high-quality optometric services to meet the needs of the offender population.

### Project Objectives
The primary objectives of this tender are to:

* Provide optometry services to the offender population at Warkworth Institution in accordance with accepted professional standards.
* Develop a comprehensive understanding of the needs and requirements of the inmate population.
* Collaborate with Institutional Chief Health Services to schedule clinic dates and ensure timely delivery of services.

### Scope of Work
The successful contractor is expected to:

* Provide optometry services to the offender population within CSC's core business hours (Monday to Friday, 8:00 am to 4:00 pm).
* Submit relevant reports and findings related to the provision of vision care to offenders.
* Disclose the maximum number of clinic hours (240 per year or 60 four-hour clinics per year).
* Negotiate and agree on the actual number of clinic hours with Institutional Chief Health Services.

## Important Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)
* **Method of Procurement:** Open bidding
* **Location:** Warkworth Institution, Ontario (except NCR)
* **End Date:** November 30, 2027
* **Pre-Qualification Procedure:** Application for registration (attached)
* **Contract Award Method:** Lowest Price

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions, please contact Danielle Murdoch at danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca or (343) 422-4831.

**Attachments:**
To obtain more information, please visit the Canada Buy Service website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). You will find the tender documents and additional information related to the project. Note: The original language of the Notice is English. However, it is also available in French as RFI Reference (No. 9401-F). Allow access only through the Canada Buy Service website.
